Key Match Events: Ismaël Koné scored with an acrobatic scissor kick to level the scores 14 minutes later
Luis Suárez scored his 69th international goal to force a penalty shootout
Luis Suárez scored the winning penalty in the shootout
Post-Match Reflections: Uruguay manager Marcelo Bielsa accused the Copa América organizers of lying multiple times throughout the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on the same field where Uruguay players entered the stands and fought with Colombia fans
Canada will consider the tournament one of their best performances since winning the 2000 Concacaf Gold Cup
